FuncDef:
The cmp-request authentication-cert command configures the certificate for identity authentication in the request through CMPv2.
The undo cmp-request authentication-cert command deletes the certificate for identity authentication in the request through CMPv2. The cmp-request authentication-cert command configures the certificate for identity authentication in the request through CMPv2. The undo cmp-request authentication-cert command deletes the certificate for identity authentication in the request through CMPv2. By default, no certificate for identity authentication in the request through CMPv2 is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a certificate file.
The certificate file name must exist and cannot contain backslashes (\), spaces, double quotation marks ("), single quotation marks ('), asterisks (*), colons (:), question marks (?), or slashes (/).
